main event: On February 17, 1969, Richard C. Mader reported an oval-shaped object emitting a white light around its outline to the Twinsburg Police Department.
interesting points: The object was reported to have red lights surrounding it., The observer noted that the object made no sound during the sighting., The object was visible for approximately 5-10 minutes before disappearing., The police were dispatched to investigate the report., Richard C. Mader expressed interest in organizations focused on investigating UFO sightings.
sighted object: oval-shaped object with white light and red lights
witness description: Richard C. Mader, age 44, foundry worker at General Electric Co.
